Name: Gigant
About the game: Gigant is a horror point and click adventure game. You must escape from the terror of the unknown creature 'Gigant' and the conflict that revolves around it. Use your reflexes to dodge the creature's attack. Combine and use tools to overcome the given challenges. Synopsis The place is Seoul, South Korea. Da-hoon, the main character who has lost his job, finds a part-time job with a suspiciously high salary. The person who proposed the job demands that Da-hoon bring the body parts of a giant man-eating creature, known as 'Gigant'. Da-hoon accepts this dangerous offer, which may risk his life. Will he survive Gigant's wrath? Features Unique scenes that is only possible in point-and-click adventure Unique lines and horror stories based on generational conflict Gameplay that actively utilizes disassembly and combination of items A different kind of fun from classic adventures through QTE Unique pixel art style
